content: a simple acorn pattern with a textured cap this is my first pattern if there are any issues please let me know ●materials 3mm hook 4 yds light brown yarn 5 yds dark brown yarn small amount of polyfil darning needle ●notes this is a no sew/ low sew pattern the only sewing is to close up the final row the seed and stem are worked in a spiral the cap is worked as a slip_stitch to the previous stitch followed by a chain s do not crochet into the slip_stitch space it is not a stitch and does not count towards your stitch count if you don t want a textured cap you can replace all double_crochet stitches with single_crochet stitches some stitches and terminology are credited to megan lapp crafty intentions
